alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 7:46AM HST until January 12 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUI AND BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts near 50 mph. * WHERE...Kauai and Niihau. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Consider postponing hiking plans. Make sure tents and awnings are secure, or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau
